data.name: Rocket League x Monstercat Vol. 4
data.detailed_description:
Rocket League X Monstercat Vol. 4 brings you adrenaline-soaked beats for the pitch AND the dance floor. Our ​penultimate collaboration of 2018, this EP is packed with a selection of tunes created specifically for Rocket League by Monstercat Uncaged artists Muzzy, Infected Mushroom, Darren Styles, Gammer ​& Dougal, Tokyo Machine, Bossfight, and Pixel Terror.

Track Listing:
1. Muzzy - Horsepower
2. Infected Mushroom - Walking on the Moon
3. Darren Styles, Gammer & Dougal - Burning Up
4. Tokyo Machine - FLY
5. Bossfight - Charge
6. Pixel Terror - Contra (feat. Sara Skinner)

Our ​penultimate collaboration of 2018, this EP is packed with a selection of tunes created specifically for Rocket League by Monstercat Uncaged artists Muzzy, Infected Mushroom, Darren Styles, Gammer ​& Dougal, Tokyo Machine,...
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
